article_title: U.S. Says To Spend $300 Million To Fight HIV In Africa
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: us, says, spend, 300, million, fight, hiv, africa

og.description: The Obama Administration said on Saturday that it's launching a major effort to fight AIDS in Africa, and hopes to provide antiretroviral treatment to 12.9 million people by the end of 2017.
